summary: Fixed 500 errors in admin routes by installing missing dependencies (@clerk/clerk-react and @faker-js/faker) and copying assets directory from /app. Admin service restarted and routes should now load correctly.
current_status: Admin subdomain setup complete with full template. Missing dependencies installed (@clerk/clerk-react, @faker-js/faker) and assets copied. Service running on port 5002. Routes should now be accessible without 500 errors.
